ygData.subject: Re: Raising Faction in Freeport?
ygData.msgSnippet: Freeport hates the Deathfist Pawns which setup tents around the surrounding area of West Gate.  If I was going to try to raise faction, I d wander around the
ygData.messageBody:
Freeport hates the Deathfist Pawns which setup tents around the surrounding area of West Gate. If I was going to try to raise faction, I'd wander around the westgate area, just beyond the city gates, killing as many Deathfist Pawns (orcs) as possible. That raises faction fairly quickly.

Just MHO.

Drev

> ----------
> From: Larimus La'shain[SMTP:larimus@...]
> Reply To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 12:09 PM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Raising Faction in Freeport?
>
> From: "Larimus La'shain" <larimus@...>
>
> Hail all,
> I'm a 13th lvl Erudite wizard currently residing in Qeynos. My
> faction there is pretty good ( I've killed many gnolls and turned in
> at least 20 fangs to Capt Tilian )I plan to relocate to Freeport
> shortly and would like to get my faction up as quickly as possible.
> What and where should I hunt to do this. I'm not as interested in exp
> until I build some good faction. Any suggestions would be appreciated.
>
> TIA
> Larimus
>
